providers.contact: If a PDS employee is injured, please notify our WC Central Team at
providers.notes: If a PDS employee is injured, please notify our WC Central Team at or , 8:00 AM – 8 to a nurse about their injury, medical assessment and care recommendations. In cases of difficulty breathing, chest pain, heavy bleeding, loss If a PDS employee is injured, please notify our WC Central Team at or , 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM EST M-F. After hours, call . This is our Clinical Consultation Nurse Triage dedicated phone line. When calling clinical consult, the employee will speak to a nurse about their injury, medical assessment and care recommendations. In cases of difficulty breathing, chest pain, heavy bleeding, loss of consciousness or life-threatening emergencies, call 911.

providers.notes: Contact: Michelle Vanetti Contact: Michelle Vanetti Email Id: Number: Kelly Fluke Program Manager, NA Operations TAPFIN T: www.talentsolutions.manpowergroup.com From: Jones, Nathan <> Sent: Wednesday, December 17, 2025 9:11 AM To: Kelly Fluke <kelly.ﬂuke@tapﬁn.com>; Aileen Macke <Aileen.Macke@tapﬁn.com> Cc: Chaudhry, Muhammad Bilal <>; Williams, Mark <>; Walker, Jonathan <> Subject: Updated Incident Reporting Contacts for Labor Providers Importance: High ⚠ Caution: The sender is from outside of our organization. Do not click on any links or open attachments unless you are expecting links/attachments from this sender. If not, please report by clicking the “Report Phishing” or “Report Spam” button above. Kelly and Aileen, Can you please provide a copy of the most updated incident reporting numbers for all contingent labor providers please? We are working on a system to help communicate who to call since we are unable to require one consistent telephonic health provider. Thanks, Nate Nate Jones Sr. Projects HSE Engineer Honeywell | Smart Energy Mobile: N a t h a n . If you have received this email in error please notify the sender by replying to this email and then delete this message and any attachments.
